brief_summary.textblock:
The genotype profile of CYP2C8 was analyzed in a Korean population. Frequency in
      multi-ethnic population and in vivo functionality of novel null allelic CYP2C8 variant were
      evaluated.

clinical_study.brief_title: Identification of Null Allelic Variant of CYP2C8 In A Korean Population

detailed_description.textblock:
Whole blood samples from 50 unrelated Korean subjects were genotyped for 3kb of 5' upstream
      region, all exon-intron boundaries, exons, and UTR regions of CYP2C8 gene by direct
      sequencing. Genotyping of CYP2C8 has been addressed only for null allelic variant, CYP2C8*11
      using pyrosequencing in the 447 Koreans, 93 African-Americans, 100 Caucasians, 348 Chineses
      and 100 Vietnameses. Then, in-vivo single PK study of CYP2C8 probe, rosiglitazone(4mg), was
      conducted in 7 healthy subjects with CYP2C8*1/*1 and 2 with CY2C8*1/*11.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Healthy volunteer

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Medical problems in taking probe drug

intervention.description: single oral administration of 4mg of rosiglitazone

clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of CYP2C8 E274Q, a Novel 23452 G>T SNP, on the Disposition of Rosiglitazone in Healthy Subjects: The Genetic Polymorphisms of CYP2C8 in a Korean Population

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Department of Pharmacology and Pharmacogenomics Research Center

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Basic Science
